comment: Has great potential for being a leading social networking provider, keep the updates coming, the development team on this app listen to problems and help where they can, excited to be involved at the beginning of an awesome future for Pjuu.

title: 5* simple social networking :)
comment: Have been using pjuu for some time. So pleased to now have the app for easy access. Brilliant social networking site without all the advertising,  hassle and complicated jargon...make friends,  talk to them...simple!:)
